title: How to define an xmmword variable in IDA?
content:
How to define an xmmword variable in IDA? IDA identified one variable as xmmword but I can't find a menu to define other variables around it as xmmwords: I also tried to set the type after pressing 
Y
key, and set it as 
xmmword
, and also tried to set the strtuct type after pressing 
Alt+Q
keys, but there is no 
xmmword
in neither of those 2.

answers_data.content:
It was 
Options -> Setup data types...
and then choosing 
octa word
:

comments.text: You can mark your answer as approved.
@sudhackar no, I can't, not yet.
